column2:
n. the season of growth
n. a metal elastic device that returns to its shape or position when pushed or pulled or pressed
n. a natural flow of ground water
n. a point at which water issues forth

n. the warmest season of the year; in the northern hemisphere it extends from the summer solstice to the autumnal equinox
n. the period of finest development, happiness, or beauty
v. spend the summer
n the season when the leaves fall from the trees

n. the coldest season of the year; in the northern hemisphere it extends from the winter solstice to the vernal equinox
v. spend the winter

v. t. To bear; to behave.
v. t. To put up with; to endure.

n. any of the Sino-Tibetan languages spoken in China; regarded as dialects of a single language (even though they are mutually unintelligible) because they share an ideographic writing system
n. a native or inhabitant of Communist China or of Nationalist China
a. of or pertaining to China or its peoples or cultures

n. an artistic form of auditory communication incorporating instrumental or vocal tones in a structured and continuous manner
n. any agreeable (pleasing and harmonious) sounds
n. musical activity (singing or whistling etc.)
n. (music) the sounds produced by singers or musical instruments (or reproductions of such sounds)

n. an Indo-European language belonging to the West Germanic branch; the official language of Britain and the United States and most of the commonwealth countries
n. the people of England
n. the discipline that studies the English language and literature

n a science (or group of related sciences) dealing with the logic of quantity and shape and arrangement
n a science (or group of related sciences) dealing with the logic of quantity and shape and arrangement
n. the 17th letter of the Hebrew alphabet

n. the products of human creativity; works of art collectively
n. the creation of beautiful or significant things
n. a superior skill that you can learn by study and practice and observation

n. the cardinal number that is the sum of six and one
s. being one more than six

n. the cardinal number that is the sum of seven and one
s. being one more than seven

n. the cardinal number that is the sum of eight and one
s. denoting a quantity consisting of one more than eight and one less than ten

n. the cardinal number that is the sum of nine and one; the base of the decimal system
s. being one more than nine

n. the cardinal number that is the sum of ten and one
s. being one more than ten

n. the cardinal number that is the sum of eleven and one
s. denoting a quantity consisting of 12 items or units

a. in operation or operational
a. (of events) planned or scheduled
r. indicates continuity or persistence or concentration
r. in a state required for something to function or be effective

s. holding office
s. directed or bound inward
s. currently fashionable
r. to or toward the inside of
